content: CAO Zhiguang | School of Computing and Information Systems | School of Computing and Information Systems showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS CAO Zhiguang Full-time Faculty Assistant Professor of Computer Science; Lee Kong Chian Fellow Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, Nanyang Technological University, 2017 Teaching Topics Statistical Thinking for Data Science Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to XIAO Xiangjie YI Hang ZHANG Ni +65 68261341 zgcao@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceDecision Making & OptimizationMachine Learning & IntelligenceUrban & SustainabilityUrban Mobility & Smart EnvironmentUrban Logistics & Sustainability Strategic Priorities Sustainable Living
